revised_title: An Investigation into the Teeth of Cartilaginous Fishes and Their Perpetual Renewal
tldr: The author examines the teeth of the Anarrhichas Lupus and Chaetodon Nigricans, and provides evidence that cartilaginous fish teeth are perpetually renewed. The study also highlights the unique structure and function of these fish's teeth, as well as their role in the animal's diet.
